lines.content: * Represents a command that can be executed by Peira.
* This is an abstract class that serves as the base for all input commands by the user.
public abstract void execute(Ui ui, Storage storage) throws PeiraExceptions;
* Indicates whether the command is an exit command.
* By default, commands are not exit commands.
* @return {@code true} if the command is an exit command, return {@code false} otherwise.

* Represents a command to change the status of a task to be completed.
* The specified task is chosen based on the index that the user enters.
* Creates a new instance of {@code MarkCommand} with a specified task index.
* @param taskIndex Index of the task to be marked as completed.
* Executes the command by calling a method from {@link Task} that marks the task
* specified by the {@code taskIndex} as completed.
* If the index given by the user is invalid, an error message is displayed.
* @param storage Storage system used to read and save to the file.
public void execute(Ui ui, Storage storage) {

* Represents a task with a specific deadline.

/** The due date/time which the task needs to be completed by. */
* Creates a new instance of {@code Deadline} with the specified description and
* @param by Due date/time of the task.

* The string format is expected to be "[D][X] description (by: due date/time)".
* @param fileString String representation of the entire task from the file.
* @return A {@code Deadline} initialized with the description and due date/time.
* Returns a string representation of the {@code Deadline} task.
* The format is: "[D][X] description (by: due date/time)".
* @return A string representation of the deadline task.
